name: Primordial Swamp UI Settings
description: Default UI settings template for agentic adjustment and user preferences

attack.title: Basic Attack
attack.description: Strike your enemy with a basic attack.

defend.title: Defend
defend.description: Take a defensive stance, reducing incoming damage and recovering stamina.

ability.title: Special Ability
ability.description: Use your species' unique ability for increased damage and effects.

flee.title: Flee
flee.description: Attempt to escape from combat. Success based on Speed difference.
flee.risk: Failed flee allows enemy free attack

combat.title: Combat Encounter
combat.description: Face a dinosaur in battle. Defeat it to continue.

resource.title: Resource Site
resource.description: Gather fossil fragments and other resources.

event.title: Random Event
event.description: Encounter a random event with various outcomes.

elite.title: Elite Enemy
elite.description: A powerful enemy with better rewards. Prepare carefully!

rest.title: Rest Site
rest.description: Rest to recover HP and fully restore stamina.

boss.title: Boss Encounter
boss.description: Face the biome's boss. Victory leads to the next area!

hp.title: Health Points (HP)
hp.description: Your current health. When it reaches 0, your run ends.

stamina.title: Stamina
stamina.description: Energy for actions. Regenerates each turn. Defending restores extra.

attack.title: Attack (ATK)
attack.description: Base damage for attacks. Higher = more damage dealt.

defense.title: Defense (DEF)
defense.description: Damage reduction. Higher = less damage taken.

speed.title: Speed (SPD)
speed.description: Determines turn order and flee success chance.

stages.title: Welcome to Primordial Swamp
stages.content: Survive the prehistoric wilderness in this roguelite adventure!

stages.title: Choose Your Dinosaur
stages.content: Each dinosaur has unique stats and abilities. Click to select, then start your run.

stages.title: Navigate the Map
stages.content: Click on available nodes to progress. Different nodes offer combat, resources, or events.

stages.title: Combat Actions
stages.content: Attack deals damage, Defend reduces damage taken, Ability uses your special move, Flee attempts escape.
